abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel faces number of challenges as he begins his second term following unexpectedly tense re-election campaign; must grapple with longstanding fiscal challenges, such as funding for city's pension and education systems, and other issues like rise in murders that has underscored ongoing problems with guns and gang violence.
lead_paragraph: Amid financial woes and increasing violence, Mr. Emanuel is also facing a hunger strike by a group of residents protesting plans for a closed school.

headline.main: Chicago’s Fiscal Problems Dog Rahm Emanuel’s 2nd Term as Mayor
headline.print_headline: After Runoff, Emanuel Keeps Facing Battles

snippet: Amid financial woes and increasing violence, Mr. Emanuel is also facing a hunger strike by a group of residents protesting plans for a closed school.

keywords.value: Dyett, Walter H, High School (Chicago, Ill)
keywords.name: organizations
